answer:
Fluzone should be available around the end of November. We recommend that you contact your local pharmacy or travel clinic to confirm availability in November. Thank you for your comment about our site.
Immunization Nurse
question: Both the Travel Clinic (Vancouver) and a local pharmacy told me Fluzone will not be available *at all* in BC this year as Ontario had bought it all. The answers here say it will be available in November. If so, I will wait. Which is accurate? Thank you by the way. This is a very helpful site.
